conferences.name: .NET Fwdays'22
conferences.description:
Developing for Linux on Windows, Azure Service Bus, MAUI, .NET6, DAPR application â€” all this and even more at our eighth .NET fwdays'22 online conference.

The main conference day will be held on October 15 at 11:00 a.m. (GMT+3). And weekdays with additional formats. Talks will be in Ukrainian and English.

10% of the cost of each ticket will be given to humanitarian missions or trusted volunteer groups of Ukraine.

speeches.name: Load Testing Distributed Systems with NBomber 4.0
